[Teacher]: but also a little late, so June 15th.   This is a narrative of a young girl, Maya, who is sitting next to her mother, Mrs Anderson, on a chilly evening in June. She's trying to hold back her tears as she shares a difficult story. Mrs Anderson wraps her arms around Maya and holds her tight, as the sound of a train chugging in the background adds to the emotional atmosphere. The scene is set in a cozy little house, with a warm fire

teacher_turns.text: but also a little late, so June 15th.   This is a narrative of a young girl, Maya, who is sitting next to her mother, Mrs Anderson, on a chilly evening in June. She's trying to hold back her tears as she shares a difficult story. Mrs Anderson wraps her arms around Maya and holds her tight, as the sound of a train chugging in the background adds to the emotional atmosphere.
